org.apache.spark.streaming.scheduler

Class JobScheduler

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.scheduler.JobScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging

    public class JobScheduler
extends Object
implements Logging
    This class schedules jobs to be run on Spark. It uses the JobGenerator to generate the jobs and runs them using a thread pool.
